name: bunnyai-pro
description: Production-Ready VS Code Extension with Advanced AI & API Tools

commands.title: Analyze Code Quality
commands.description: Analyze code quality metrics (complexity, maintainability) for the current file

commands.title: Review & Refactor Selection
commands.description: AI-powered code review and refactoring for selected code

commands.title: Remove Comments from Selection
commands.description: Remove comments from selected code or entire file (preserves strings)

commands.title: Security Scan File
commands.description: Scan current file for security vulnerabilities (hardcoded secrets, SQL injection, etc.)

commands.title: Explain Security Issues (with AI)
commands.description: Get AI-powered explanations for security issues found in the last scan

commands.title: Analyze Workspace Code Health
commands.description: Analyze code health across the entire workspace (complexity, security, quality metrics)

commands.title: Review Pull Request
commands.description: AI-powered code review for GitHub Pull Requests

commands.title: Configure GitHub Token
commands.description: Configure GitHub personal access token for PR reviews

commands.title: Analyze Logs
commands.description: Parse and analyze runtime logs (Node.js, Python, Java, Go, Docker)

commands.title: Diagnose Runtime Error
commands.description: Get AI-powered diagnosis for a runtime error from logs

commands.title: Generate Architecture Overview
commands.description: Analyze workspace and generate architecture documentation with diagrams

commands.title: Export Architecture Docs
commands.description: Export architecture documentation to Markdown files

commands.title: Analyze Workspace for Refactor
commands.description: Analyze workspace structure and propose refactoring opportunities

commands.title: Apply Workspace Refactor
commands.description: Apply the generated refactor plan to the workspace

commands.title: Run Migration
commands.description: Run a code migration (JS to TS, Express to NestJS, React Class to Hooks, etc.)

commands.title: Enforce Architecture Rules
commands.description: Check and enforce project-level architecture rules (naming, structure, imports)

bunnyai.baseUrl.description: Default base URL for API requests

bunnyai.defaultTimeout.description: Default timeout for API requests in milliseconds

bunnyai.cacheTTL.description: Cache time-to-live in milliseconds (5 minutes default)

bunnyai.maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed requests

bunnyai.aiProvider.description: AI provider for test generation and error analysis (supports openai, anthropic, openrouter, custom)

bunnyai.aiApiKey.description: API key for AI provider (stored securely)

bunnyai.aiModel.description: AI model to use (e.g., gpt-4, gpt-3.5-turbo, claude-3)

bunnyai.autoDetectFramework.description: Automatically detect framework from project files

bunnyai.maxRequestBodySize.description: Maximum request body size in bytes (default 1 MB)

bunnyai.maxResponseSize.description: Maximum response size in bytes (default 10 MB)

bunnyai.enableSecurityScanning.description: Enable security scanning in workspace analysis

bunnyai.maxWorkspaceFiles.description: Maximum number of files to analyze per workspace scan

bunnyai.highComplexityThreshold.description: Cyclomatic complexity threshold for highlighting high complexity functions

bunnyai.criticalComplexityThreshold.description: Cyclomatic complexity threshold for critical complexity warnings

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
